org.sd.cluster.service
Class ClusterProcessHandle

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.service.ClusterProcessHandle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, ProcessHandle
public class ClusterProcessHandle
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProcessHandle

Runnable container for sending, monitoring, and collecting the service task's results.

Author:
Spence Koehler

getCompletionRatio

public long[] getCompletionRatio()
Get the ratio of completion.
  • doneSoFar -- the total number of units of work done so far or -1 if counting has not been started.
  • toBeDone -- the total number of units of work to be done or -1 if unknown.

Specified by:
getCompletionRatio in interface ProcessHandle
Returns:
{doneSoFar, toBeDone}

runUntilDone

public ServiceResults runUntilDone(long checkInterval,
                                   java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean die)
Wait until the process has finished or a signal to die has been issued, returning the current results.

Specified by:
runUntilDone in interface ProcessHandle
Parameters:
checkInterval - Amount of time to wait between checking for termination.
die - Flag to monitor for signal to end (ok if null).
Returns:
non-null ServiceResults, possibly incomplete.
